description: Pazner, Avi, 1937- -- Photographs; Shamir, Itzhak, 1915-2012 -- Photographs
label: As every year, the November 29th is the anniverssary of the UNO decision of approving the creation of the Jewish State, was held by the Israel Press Association with the presence of the Prime Minister Itzhak Shamir.
